original_title: Homeward Bound: A Grammy Salute to the Songs of Paul Simon
overview: A special tribute concert honoring 16-time Grammy winner Paul Simon that took place on April 6 2022 with a special appearance by the legendary singer/songwriter himself. The special tribute concert features performances from Dave Matthews, Brad Paisley, Brandi Carlile, Billy Porter, Rhiannon Giddens, Shaggy & many more.
title: Homeward Bound: A Grammy Salute to the Songs of Paul Simon
